question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. b. Labour Party (PvdA)
raw_output:
I have a somewhat favorable opinion of the Labour Party (PvdA) because I believe they generally promote social justice and workers' rights, although I am aware of some criticisms regarding their effectiveness in implementing policies. Therefore, I would choose a moderate positive stance.

ANSWER: B
